name: Amelia Chen
persona: Amelia Chen is a 20-year-old Biology major with a solid CGPA of 3.22. She is diligent and motivated, setting high goals for herself and consistently working to achieve them, though she sometimes struggles with maintaining effort during particularly challenging periods. Amelia generally feels confident in her academic abilities and manages test anxiety fairly well, allowing her to perform steadily in exams. Her perseverance helps her overcome setbacks, and she is always looking for ways to improve her study habits and time management.
